r.s: A Native Windows binding for PHP
r.d: WinBinder is a new extension that allows PHP programmers to build native Windows applications. It wraps the Windows API in a lightweight, easy-to-use library so that program creation is quick and straightforward.
r.n:
- New installer includes PHP version 4.4.1, SQLite, FreeImage, HTML sources for manual and other files. Server for downloading PHP 5.0.5 is selectable - New, much better folder structure (thanks Techtonik, Stefano) - wb_load_image() and wb_set_image() can load/set small icons (thanks EK) - wb_get_size() can also return the dimensions of a text in pixels - wb_sys_dlg_save() now allows a default extension to be added to file names - wb_set_selected() allows selection of root node in treeviews - Treeviews now keep the selected item highlighted (usually in gray) when focus is lost - Implemented non-read-only (editable) combo boxes - New function: wb_draw_ellipse() - Included parameter for dashed line styles in some drawing functions - Lots of changes and fixes in the PHP scripts, as well as a couple of new ones
... and many other fixes and changes as usual. Please make sure you read the changelog for the complete list!
